user_query: I want to surprise my dad with a vinyl record of his favorite artist. Can you recommend albums by The Beatles and provide me with the Year-End Billboard 200 Albums for 2021? Also, suggest a playlist for a relaxing evening.

TaskList.description: Retrieve a list of albums by The Beatles.
Fetch the Year-End Billboard 200 Albums for 2021.
Generate a suggested playlist for a relaxing evening.
